title: Frontend Developer (Intern)
description: Currently interning at TM30 Global Limited, focusing on building clean, responsive banking agency UIs with HTML, CSS, and React.js.
Developed a static banking dashboard prototype to match design specifications—laying the groundwork for future interactivity.
Deepening skills in advanced JavaScript, React‑Redux, and TypeScript through hands‑on tasks and mentorship.
Collaborating with senior developers in Agile ceremonies—attending sprint planning, stand‑ups, and code reviews to absorb best practices.

title: Front. Developer (Academic Projects)
description: Delivered multiple final‑year projects as the frontend lead, including a Biometric Attendance System and an OCR‑based Vehicle Verification System among others.
Built a mobile‑first React web app for the biometric system, integrating Firebase for real‑time data and an Arduino fingerprint scanner for hardware interaction.
Reimplemented the vehicle verification solution with Python, OpenCV, and Tesseract OCR to automatically read license plates, replacing earlier RFID‑based approaches.
Ensured clean, responsive UI/UX and robust API integration across all projects, adhering to accessibility and performance best practices.
Collaborated with teammates on design, documentation, and presentations to academic panels.

title: Freelancer
description: Collaborated with clients on Upwork to build fast, responsive websites with HTML, CSS and vanilla JavaScript.
Turned design mockups into pixel‑perfect, accessible layouts across all major browsers.
Enhanced UX with sliders, modals and real‑time form validation using modern JavaScript and the DOM API.
Boosted performance by trimming assets and lazy‑loading content for snappier load times.
Kept communication clear via messages and video calls to nail down requirements and hit every deadline.
